snippet: Mayor Michael Bloomberg’s proposals to buttress New York City gives his successor a good starting point.
abstract: Editorial welcomes New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg's proposal to protect 520 miles of shoreline and fortify city against storms like Hurricane Sandy; holds proposal will require intense effort to execute effectively; contends Bloomberg has done city a service for introducing broader strategy to address worst consequences of climate change.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael Bloomberg’s proposals to buttress New York City gives his successor a good starting point.
